page.title: 09NEWNHAM POOL PLANS
page.content: On Sunday 7th July 1985 the{ {"Bedfordshire on Sunday"}brought out the plans of what Sainsburys,one of the biggest shopping chains in England would like to do with Newnham swimming pool and the area around it. The plans were published just 24 hours before the council had to make their final decision to demolish the pool. What Sainsburys intend to do is build a Homebase near the pool, which would sell DIY and garden items. With the Homebase would come more parking space and a nice garden area. In the garden would be a nice big greenhouse. If they do up the pool it will mean lowering and deepening the whole thing. The pool will provide paddling on an artificial beach and a solarium. Also at the pool they are going to have a disco room and a family restaurant.
